description.ko: 구조적 질서와 디지털 혼돈 사이의 섬세한 균형을 날카로운 흑백 기하학적 형태로 표현했습니다.
description.en: A representation of the delicate balance between structural order and digital chaos, rendered in sharp monochrome geometric forms.

prompt: A minimalist, brutalist obsidian structure mid-disintegration within a stark #FFFFFF digital void. Sharp #1A1A1A geometric angles are fracturing into vertical #C0C0C0 scanlines and chaotic digital debris. High-contrast cinematic lighting with razor-sharp shadows and raytraced reflections. The composition emphasizes chaos within order, featuring deep textures of digital noise and monochrome complexity. 8k, Octane Render, raytracing, a perfect balance created by fragments.
